cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
mng: firewood, lean (of meat), thin (of a person)

exm.mng: firewood, lean (of meat), thin (of a person)
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
as thin as a match, emaciated (idiom)
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
to chop firewood, to split logs
lit. woodcutter's family, humble background, poor family background
Piotr Ilyich Tchaikowsky (1840-1893), Russian composer, composer of 6 symphonies and the opera Eugene Onegin

exm.cur: 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧
exm.trd: 留得青山在，不怕沒柴燒
exm.mng: While the green hills last, there'll be wood to burn (idiom). Where there's life there's hope.
exm.pyn: liú de qīng shān zài , bù pà méi chái shāo

exm.mng: Da Qaidam county level subdivision of Haixi Mongol and Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海西蒙古族藏族自治州[Hai3 xi1 Meng3 gu3 zu2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
